name: Sneaky Boy
description:
Sneaky boy is a stealth game prototype based on a reality show. Your main goal is stealing the delicious cookies that are in the kitchen, but there are a lot of cameras
that can get you caught. In order to avoid them, you will have to use your phone and see where they are aiming at, and get past them without being noticed.

Developers: 

Jorge Durán - Twitter: @jorgedgq99 

Jorge Sánchez - Twitter: @Koke232

Enjoy it!
